environmentConfigGuide.replit: Digital Desk is configured to run in Replit. Use the Start application workflow to run the application.
instructions: Always use 0.0.0.0 instead of localhost for host bindings
Use relative paths from project root instead of absolute paths
Do not modify Vite configuration files
Do not modify package.json directly; use the package manager tool instead
Do not use Docker or containerization

notes: The project has migrated from Drizzle ORM to Prisma ORM
Do not use Drizzle ORM methods or imports
Use environment variable DATABASE_URL to connect to the database
Avoid database migrations through direct SQL; use Prisma migrations instead

uiGuide.styling: Tailwind CSS with ShadCN UI components
featureNotes: Do not use localhost in API calls; use relative paths instead
Use LoadingState components for loading states
Use the context API for state management across components

notes: The application is configured to run using Replit workflows
Do not manually start the server from the terminal
The workflow will restart automatically on file changes
